org.springframework.data.repository.query.spi

类 Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.query.spi.Function

  • public class Function
extends Object
    Value object to represent a function. Can either be backed by a static Method invocation (see Function(Method)) or a method invocation on an instance (see Function(Method, Object).
    从以下版本开始:
    1.9

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Function(Method method)
      Creates a new Function to statically invoke the given Method.
      Function(Method method, Object target)
      Creates a new Function for the given method on the given target instance.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Class<?> getDeclaringClass()
      Returns the type declaring the Function.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the function.
      int getParameterCount()
      Returns the number of parameters required by the underlying method.
      Object invoke(Object[] arguments)
      Invokes the function with the given arguments.
      boolean isSignatureEqual(Function other)
      Checks wether this Function has the same signature as another Function.
      boolean supports(List<org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor> argumentTypes)
      Returns true if the function can be called with the given argumentTypes.
      boolean supportsExact(List<org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor> argumentTypes)
      Checks if the encapsulated method has exactly the argument types as those passed as an argument.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Function

        public Function(Method method,
                @Nullable
                Object target)
        Creates a new Function for the given method on the given target instance.
        参数:
        method - must not be null.
        target - can be null, if so, the method

        public boolean supports(List<org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor> argumentTypes)
        Returns true if the function can be called with the given argumentTypes.
        参数:
        argumentTypes -
        返回:

      • getParameterCount

        public int getParameterCount()
        Returns the number of parameters required by the underlying method.
        返回:

      • supportsExact

        public boolean supportsExact(List<org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor> argumentTypes)
        Checks if the encapsulated method has exactly the argument types as those passed as an argument.
        参数:
        argumentTypes - a list of TypeDescriptors to compare with the argument types of the method
        返回:
        true if the types are equal, false otherwise.

      • isSignatureEqual

        public boolean isSignatureEqual(Function other)
        Checks wether this Function has the same signature as another Function.
        参数:
        other - the Function to compare this with.
        返回:
        true iff name and argument list are the same.
